item.title: If no one told you today, just know that I’m proud of you and I love you and I want only what’s best for you. Stay safe out there and know that you have people that love you and I’m one of them. #Love #Support #Community.
item.description: If no one told you today, just know that I’m proud of you and I love you and I want only what’s best for you. Stay safe out there and know that you have people that love you and I’m one of them. #Love #Support #Community.

item.title: Getting an escort from the cops down the freeway is a perfect way to spend a ride. These boys know how to move through some traffic. #Motorcycle #Motorcycles #Freeway #LaneSplit

item.title: Congratulations all of those who are saving up to get their first bike or their next bike. You’re gonna have so much fun! Just remember to take it slow and ride your own ride. Speed will come with skill and skill will come with practice. #Motorcycle #Moto

item.title: One thing new riders often struggle with is finding balance in the friction zone. The friction zone is when you lightly pull in the clutch and allow the bike, the ability to gain forward momentum. But if you get out of the friction zone by releasing the c

item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s talk about shifting on a motorcycle. There are two way ways to tell when it’s time to shift either up or down when riding a motorcycle. The first is going to be by looking at the RPMs and hearing how loud the bike is. High noise and high RPMs means
item.description: Let’s talk about shifting on a motorcycle. There are two way ways to tell when it’s time to shift either up or down when riding a motorcycle. The first is going to be by looking at the RPMs and hearing how loud the bike is. High noise and high RPMs means
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: I was really proud of this. I honestly don’t think I can make a better analogy or way of teaching shifting then opening and closing a door and sending someone through and turning off the music. It’s truly some of my best work. #Motorcycle #Shifting #BikeL
item.description: I was really proud of this. I honestly don’t think I can make a better analogy or way of teaching shifting then opening and closing a door and sending someone through and turning off the music. It’s truly some of my best work. #Motorcycle #Shifting #BikeL
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: So far, this is my favorite analogy to use for describing shifting and rev matching on a motorcycle. I thought of it on the spot and this is my first time trying to explain it, so bear with me as I refine it to its simplest form. #revmatch #DownShifting #
item.description: So far, this is my favorite analogy to use for describing shifting and rev matching on a motorcycle. I thought of it on the spot and this is my first time trying to explain it, so bear with me as I refine it to its simplest form. #revmatch #DownShifting #
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: The brakes on your motorcycle are the most important thing to learn. Without quality brakes, you may only get to twist the throttle once. With that being said, I hope you find this video entertaining because I had a lot of fun making it for you. #Motorcyc
item.description: The brakes on your motorcycle are the most important thing to learn. Without quality brakes, you may only get to twist the throttle once. With that being said, I hope you find this video entertaining because I had a lot of fun making it for you. #Motorcyc

item.title: I’m not sure she loved it, but I did so we’re gonna keep practicing. If you’re a dancer then please send help otherwise we’re gonna end up copying the dance from dirty, dancing, and coyote ugly. #firstdance #wedding #sendhelp

item.title: Riding a motorcycle is hard enough lol trying to make videos about it while doing it sometimes gets me overthinking the unimportant stuff and when that happens just simplify and do it like a normal person. Or in the words of Chit, do it lady. @@Jay Rensha
item.description: Riding a motorcycle is hard enough lol trying to make videos about it while doing it sometimes gets me overthinking the unimportant stuff and when that happens just simplify and do it like a normal person. Or in the words of Chit, do it lady. @@Jay Rensha

item.title: This was a great day! Absolutely in love with this Honda Rebel 1100. It’s such a fun all around cruiser. I highly recommend it to anyone interested in riding. #honda #rebel1100 #hondarebel #newbike #motorcycle

item.title: Motorcycles are so much fun. The friction zone that little pull between stopping and going. Sometimes progress just needs a release of tension and a little bit (or a lot a bit) of throttle. ##motorcycle#m#motom#motorcycles
